Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Hunter Biden was chairman of the World Food Program, which just won the Nobel Peace Prize. The World Food Program USA is a separate entity and Hunter Biden served as chairman of its board from 2011 to 2015.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Eric Trump, Donald J Trump Jr, and Ivanka Trump are banned from ever operating a charity again because they stole donations to children with cancer. There is no evidence to support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to support the accusation that the Trump children stole donations to children with cancer.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Trump children are banned from operating a charity again, which is not true according to the settlement announced by the New York Attorney General.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the claim is a politically motivated attack on Hunter Biden and the Trump family, as suggested by the fact that a liberal Facebook page is pushing back against these attacks.
